segments.text: Hi . I need more amenities , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you be a little more specific , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , to be more specific , the free stuff , like soap , lotion , and shampoo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . Now , you're saying that you've already used up all your amenities ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no ! I've got all I need for my stay here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But , sir , our souvenir shop carries all those items .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not the same thing . If you buy hotel souvenirs , they have no sentimental value .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand , sir . I'll call housekeeping . You'll have your souvenirs shortly .
segments.speaker: S2
